snippet.title: Slendrina Remake | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
🔗Game link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2768100/Slendrina_Remake/

Description:
Face your fears in Slendrina Remake! 👁️💀 Explore dark, eerie corridors as you try to escape Slendrina’s grasp. Solve puzzles, find clues, and survive the nightmare. Will you uncover the truth, or will she get you first? Play now on Steam!

#SlendrinaRemake #HorrorGame #SurvivalHorror
